title: 100 Killed, Over 400 Injured In Israeli Strikes, Says Lebanon
content: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on the south killed 100 people and wounded more than 400 others on Monday, the worst toll in nearly a year of cross-border clashes.
summary: Lebanon's health ministry said Israeli strikes on the south killed 100 people and wounded more than 400 others on Monday, the worst toll in nearly a year of cross-border clashes.

title: With AI, Dead Celebrities Are Working Again And Making Millions
content: The dead-celebrity industry has proved lucrative. Despite Michael Jackson being about $500 million in debt at the time of his death, his estate has amassed a fortune of $2 billion, according to People.
summary: The dead-celebrity industry has proved lucrative. Despite Michael Jackson being about $500 million in debt at the time of his death, his estate has amassed a fortune of $2 billion, according to People.

title: Opinion: Biggest Takeaway From Quad Summit Is That It's Here To Stay
content: With enduring wars in Europe and the Middle East, China's belligerent activities in the Indo-Pacific region and emerging non-traditional security challenges in the region, the Quad had its task cut out.
summary: With enduring wars in Europe and the Middle East, China's belligerent activities in the Indo-Pacific region and emerging non-traditional security challenges in the region, the Quad had its task cut out.

title: 'Stranded' Sunita Williams Now Commands International Space Station
content: Indian-origin NASA astronaut Sunita Williams is now commander of the International Space Station. She was in space on an eight-day mission that had to be extended to over eight months because the spacecraft she travelled in faced glitches
summary: Indian-origin NASA astronaut Sunita Williams is now commander of the International Space Station. She was in space on an eight-day mission that had to be extended to over eight months because the spacecraft she travelled in faced glitches

title: Satellite Images Expose Crater After Russia's Sarmat Missile Test Failure
content: A Russian RS-28 Sarmat intercontinental ballistic missile likely failed during a test earlier this month, according to arms experts and satellite imagery from the launch site.
summary: A Russian RS-28 Sarmat intercontinental ballistic missile likely failed during a test earlier this month, according to arms experts and satellite imagery from the launch site.

title: Xiaomi Seeks Recall Of Controversial Antitrust Report On Flipkart From India
content: China's Xiaomi has asked India's antitrust body to recall its report that found the company and Walmart's Flipkart breached competition laws, arguing it contains commercial secrets, two people familiar with the matter said.
summary: China's Xiaomi has asked India's antitrust body to recall its report that found the company and Walmart's Flipkart breached competition laws, arguing it contains commercial secrets, two people familiar with the matter said.

title: South Africa To Add Incentives, Improve Black Empowerment System
content: The head of South Africa's flagship Black economic empowerment programme plans to introduce additional incentives and potential fines to improve corporate participation and curb exploitation of the system meant to tackle the country's gross inequalit

title: As Hamas Chief Yahya Sinwar Goes Missing, Israel Probes If He Is Dead
content: Hamas's Gaza-based leader Yahya Sinwar has been incommunicado for a long time, making Israel look for evidence of his possible death.
summary: Hamas's Gaza-based leader Yahya Sinwar has been incommunicado for a long time, making Israel look for evidence of his possible death.

title: "Jai Hanuman": PM Modi Greets Rapper HanuMankind At New York Event
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met rapper HanuMankind at the 'Modi and US' event in Long Island, New York, on Sunday.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met rapper HanuMankind at the 'Modi and US' event in Long Island, New York, on Sunday.

title: The Rise Of Lanka's Anura Kumara Dissanayake From Grassroots To President
content: Anura Kumara Dissanayake has been elected as Sri Lanka’s next president, securing victory in the country’s first election since its economic collapse in 2022.
summary: Anura Kumara Dissanayake has been elected as Sri Lanka’s next president, securing victory in the country’s first election since its economic collapse in 2022.

title: Sri Lanka's First Leftist President Sworn In After Landslide Election Win
content: Sri Lanka's first leftist president was sworn into office Monday vowing to restore public faith in politics after anger over the island nation's unprecedented economic crisis propelled him to a landslide poll win.
summary: Sri Lanka's first leftist president was sworn into office Monday vowing to restore public faith in politics after anger over the island nation's unprecedented economic crisis propelled him to a landslide poll win.

title: Google's Sundar Pichai Shares Highlights Of PM Modi's Roundtable With CEOs
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi wants to ensure that Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology benefits the people of India and is challenging tech giants to do more in this direction, Google CEO Sundar Pichai has said.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi wants to ensure that Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology benefits the people of India and is challenging tech giants to do more in this direction, Google CEO Sundar Pichai has said.

title: Drugs, Baby Oil, Video Tools: Rapper Diddy's "Freak Off" Sexual Encounters
content: The US government has launched a high-profile sex trafficking and racketeering case against music mogul Sean Combs, aka Diddy, accusing him of orchestrating coercive and abusive sexual encounters at luxury hotels.
summary: The US government has launched a high-profile sex trafficking and racketeering case against music mogul Sean Combs, aka Diddy, accusing him of orchestrating coercive and abusive sexual encounters at luxury hotels.

title: A Lookback At October 7: How Hamas Attacked Israel Nearly A Year Ago
content: Hamas's multipronged attack on southern Israel on October 7 was unprecedented in scale. The panic and confusion it caused made many details of what was happening difficult to establish immediately.
summary: Hamas's multipronged attack on southern Israel on October 7 was unprecedented in scale. The panic and confusion it caused made many details of what was happening difficult to establish immediately.

title: Kate Middleton Makes First Public Appearance After Cancer Treatment
content: Kate Middleton made her first public appearance on Sunday after completing her chemotherapy.

title: Hezbollah Announces "New Phase" Of War, Israel Issues "Hit Anyone" Warning

title: US Boy Who Was Kidnapped From California In 1951 Returns 70 Years Later
content: A man who was abducted as a six-year-old boy over 70 years ago has been found alive on the East Coast of the United States. Luis Armando Albino disappeared on February 21, 1951, from a park in West Oakland, California.
summary: A man who was abducted as a six-year-old boy over 70 years ago has been found alive on the East Coast of the United States. Luis Armando Albino disappeared on February 21, 1951, from a park in West Oakland, California.

title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman Reveals His Top Strategy For Life Without Regrets
content: In 2005, he made a career-defining decision by dropping out of Stanford to create Loopt, a location-based social networking app.
